actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that the computation of the account of payment to any state under that act shall take into account Indian held lands located within such state.

summary.text: Amends existing law governing payments made to local governments for public lands within such localities. Redefines "entitlement lands" for purposes of determining eligibility for such payments.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the computation of the account of payment to any state under that act shall take into account Indian held lands located within such state.
